author: Epic Games
description:
Become the immortal hunter and stand against the archdemon Asmodeus. Cut through bullet-hell swarms, clash with Souls-like bosses, and harness celestial blessings that reshape your powers each run. 
The demons are rising—raise your sword.

Try the Demo now on Epic Game Store: https://epic.gm/ember-blade-demo
title: Ember and Blade | Demo Now Available!

author: Epic Games
description:
The action-RPG video game is the sequel to the cult classic Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines. Vampire: the Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 lets players step into its story through two distinct, alternating perspectives: Elder vampire Phyre and Malkavian detective Fabien. 

Pre-purchase now: https://epic.gm/vtm-bloodlines2

Today we bring you a new glimpse into the Clan of Warlocks. Meet the Tremere characters of Seattle and see Phyre's magic in action. 

Tremere starts with "Dominate" and "Blood Sorcery" as clan affinities, and "Corrosive Touch" as the passive ability. Then as the game progresses you'll be able to unlock the following Tremere disciplines:

"Blood Curse": Curses the opponent to swell up and explode after recieving damage.
"Cauldron of Blood": Boil a person's blood. Their screams will draw others close.
"Recall": Mark your current position. Use again to return to that position. 
"Blood Salvo": Conjure a set of blood daggers that can be thrown at enemies.
"Blood of Potency
title: Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 | Tremere Clan Trailer
